channel.title: Pi dialogue teleporting a person help

item.title: Pi dialogue teleporting a person help
item.dc:creator: @pastaway pastaway
item.description:
@pastaway wrote:

ok im trying to get to where an object gives a list of places and when you click them they teleport you to different altar loctions. its not going to well for me and i kinda need some help to get it to fully work :s
This is what i have so far:

ActionHandler:

case 10782: c.getDH().sendDialogues(200, 0); break;
dialoguehander:

case 200: sendOption4("Air Altar","Fire Altar","Earth Altar","Water Altar"); c.nextChat = 201; break; case 201: sendOption4("Chaos Altar","Law Altar","Death Altar","Cosmic Altar"); c.dialogueAction = 201; break;
clickingbuttons.java:

case 2482: if (c.dialogueAction == 200) c.getPA().startTeleport(2444, 5170, 0, "modern"); break;

when i click the button in my cmd prompt ‘2482’ pops up so im pretty sure i have that part right but it still wont teleport my player to the coords (2444,5170) when i click air altar.

Read full topic
item.source: Pi dialogue teleporting a person help
